name: Mississippi Tea Cakes
author: prissycat
summary: This is my mother's recipe, her mother's recipe, and so on...  Basic, simple, down-home and delicious!! My grandmother's advice is to enjoy warm with a big glass of ice-cold milk!!!  Poor folks' heaven!!!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth
Combine flour, baking powder, and baking soda; beat into the creamed mixture alternately with the buttermilk
Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
